body: I tried to disable the wrong test cases, but other test cases related to ZK also failed in jdk17. By checking the log, I found that the problem unit test were caused by using ZK.

Maybe The ZK version used by dubbo3.0 does have compatibility problems under jdk17.  May be remove the workflow of jdk17 until ZK officially fixes this problem is a good idea?
@chickenlj
Can you paste your xml configuration?

This link is avaliable

https://dubbo.apache.org/en/docs/contribution-guidelines/

> This link is avaliable
> 
> https://dubbo.apache.org/en/docs/contribution-guidelines/

Can someone fix this link? @chickenlj  @AlbumenJ

> 报的是序列化异常，因为Function跟BiConsumer没有实现序列化导致的，但这个接口默认方法应该是在消费端执行的，应该不需要序列化才对

另外补充一下，函数式接口不是在消费端执行的，这段代码会被序列化发送到服务端，在服务端执行
Not found exported service 是服务端报的，还是消费端报的

> Who can help deal with this problem, otherwise everyone's PR can't be submitted @AlbumenJ @chickenlj @pinxiong

@codeimport @juzi214032 I'll fix this issue.

It can be sure that the cause of this problem is that `zookeeper` instances didn't work. There are several steps to check when the failed testcases you have mentioned are running:

1. Check if there are two `zookeeper` processes first
2. Check if the zookeeper archive binary file is downloaded successfully
   + All of download info will be in the given path, if you set `-DembeddedZookeeperPath`
   + and then to check the `.tmp/zookeeper` directory in `user.home`
   + finally you can check the `.tmp/zookeeper` directory in `java.io.tmpdir`

In most cases, this problem is caused by zooKeeper not being downloaded.

If there is no internet in the running environment, you also can copy the downloaded zookeeper archive binary (it's version should be equal or greater than `3.6.0`) in  the `.tmp/zookeeper` directory in `user.home`. Here is an example below:

Suppose you didn't set `-DembeddedZookeeperPath` and
+ `user.home` is `/Users/myhostname`
+ The copied zookeeper archive binary file is named `apache-zookeeper-3.6.3-bin.tar.gz`

What you need to do as below:
+ Create a directory named `.tmp/zookeeper` in `/Users/myhostname`
+ Copy the file `apache-zookeeper-3.6.3-bin.tar.gz` in `/Users/myhostname/.tmp/zookeeper`
+ Rename the file `apache-zookeeper-3.6.3-bin.tar.gz` to `apache-zookeeper-bin.tar.gz`

And then you can have a try.

> Not found exported service 是服务端报的，还是消费端报的

服务端，因为调到了未非组的服务端，没有对应的分组接口

> 

Hi, I used dubbo annotation (not xml) to export dubbo service.
There is an important point:  Dubbo Service  A and Dubbo Service B are in the same one java process.

> 理论上上dubbo2和dubbo3是不能通信的吧，比如你的这种场景提供者是2.6.x，消费者是3.x

2和3是不兼容的吗？ 但是如果不是这样的分组情况的话，是可以正常调用的哦。

> > 理论上上dubbo2和dubbo3是不能通信的吧，比如你的这种场景提供者是2.6.x，消费者是3.x
> 
> 2和3是不兼容的吗？ 但是如果不是这样的分组情况的话，是可以正常调用的哦。

抱歉，我理解错了
Yes, you are right. It is because of the client version not compatible with JDK 17.

> #8836

请问下，这个问题哪个版本修复阿

这个issue在2.7.12、2.7.13、2.7.14版本还存在，2.7.15版本亲测已修复。现象为执行referenceconfig#destroy后，未执行到org.apache.dubbo.registry.integration.RegistryDirectory#unSubscribe，导致未执行ONSUMER_CONFIGURATION_LISTENER.removeNotifyListener(this)，最终表现为org.apache.dubbo.registry.integration.RegistryDirectory.ConsumerConfigurationListener#listeners中还保留了destroy之前的RegistryDirectory.

> 问题已找到： 1、我们有调用ReferenceConfig.destroy() [3295](https://github.com/apache/dubbo/pull/3295) 也是同样的问题，但是他在2.7.1修复了，我使用的版本是2.7.12还是有这个问题

升级到2.7.15

修改后的NetUtils.java的findNetworkInterface返回的是第一个可用的网卡，也就是权重最高的网卡，只是你们恰好是本地虚拟网桥段地址，之前的代码忘了break循环，所以取了最后一个可用的网卡，在虚拟机等大多数环境下最后一个网卡权重最小，使用出问题的概率最大，这个问题没有办法兼顾，否则也不会搞个-DDUBBO_IP_TO_BIND启动参数指定ip地址了，我个人认为获取本地地址还是取权重最大的网卡较为合适，只是你们的情况比较特殊，恰好要使用权重最小的网卡。
复杂网络环境下建议在启动脚本设置 -DDUBBO_IP_TO_BIND=x.x.x.x的方式，自动获取本地地址的方法无论怎么搞都不可能解决所有的场景。
